summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Quickliner For Lips is an all-day lip liner that glides on. Prevents lipstick from feathering, bleeding.
details: DetailsBenefitsNon-drying formula helps keep lipstick in place.Use to line and define lips or smooth all over lips before lipstick application for extended wear.No sharpening required.Dermatologist tested.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesFragranceItem 2576541How To UsePrepare lips for colour with All About Lips. Swivel up only 1/8" (pencil does not retract to avoid exposing formula to air, which is drying). Follow "dot-dot-dash" method to ensure ease and accuracy of application: Draw two dots on upper lip's bow, a dash across bottom of lower lip, then connect all three. To extend lip colour wear, fill in lips with liner, then follow with a lipstick. Recap securely to protect formula.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.IngredientsCyclopentasiloxane, Synthetic Beeswax, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Arachidyl Behenate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Microcrystalline Wax\Cera Microcristallina\Cire Microcristalline, Dimethiconol, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Mica, Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 36 (CI 12085), Red 6 (CI 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Orange 5 (CI 45370), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Carmine (CI 75470).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Prepare lips for colour with All About Lips. Swivel up only 1/8" (pencil does not retract to avoid exposing formula to air, which is drying). Follow "dot-dot-dash" method to ensure ease and accuracy of application: Draw two dots on upper lip's bow, a dash across bottom of lower lip, then connect all three. To extend lip colour wear, fill in lips with liner, then follow with a lipstick. Recap securely to protect formula.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.

reviews.headline: Nice creamy lip liner
reviews.comments: I have been using Clinique for years. Love the creamy lip liner and the no sharpening like a pencil.

reviews.headline: OK
reviews.comments:
Honestly for the price theres very little product (0.01oz) to none compared to other lip pencils ranging around the same price and Its a little drying in my opinion. 
I dont like that you can't sharpen it because as you start using it more often the tip starts to round and its gives very little precision. I will say it does have a long power stay though but another flaw is you cant tell how much there is bcs it doesnt really go up or down at all but pretty color just not for me

reviews.headline: The lip liner is the one I usually use..
reviews.comments: This is exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.headline: Been using this for years!
reviews.comments: I adore this lipliner! The color is rich and lasts a long time.  I follow it up with a creamy, moisturizing lighter color for an ombre effect.  Without the moisturizing outer layer, it can be a but drying.  As long as you plan to use gloss or a second layer, its fabulous.

reviews.headline: I would purchase this liner again.
reviews.comments: I love this lip liner great color and packaging as I do not like to sharpen liners.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: None

reviews.headline: black honey.
reviews.comments: Plummy is the perfect shade if you are looking to match the black honey almost lipstick or lip oil!

reviews.headline: black honey.
reviews.comments: Plummy is the perfect shade if you are looking to match the black honey almost lipstick or lip oil!

reviews.headline: I would buy this again!
reviews.comments: Love this lip liner. Actually I use it as my lip stick. Very neutral, which I like can wear anytime!

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS LIPLINER
reviews.comments: Great product, goes on smoothly and stays on.  The color goes with my lipstick so it blends in well.

reviews.headline: Leary of ordering old product online
reviews.comments: I would liked to have tried it, but it was dried out.  I took it back to Ulta to swap, but they were out so I just got my money back.

reviews.headline: Again and again - great color
reviews.comments: I couldn't tell you how many times I have purchased this color.

reviews.headline: Cool Lipliner
reviews.comments: Clinique discontinued their staple 'Figgy' lipliner recently, and this seems to be the replacement.  This is more plum than fig colored, but it works for my fair cool skin.

reviews.headline: Soft and Easy to Apply
reviews.comments: I love this liner.  So soft and easy to apply.  Going to get other colors for sure

reviews.headline: Lip liner
reviews.comments:
I like my lip liner. 

I use it along with my lipstick to enhance the look of my lips.

reviews.headline: My go to neutral shade
reviews.comments: This is the perfect nude lipliner!  My skin tends to grab reds and this shade stays brown neutral color on me.  Goes on easy.

reviews.headline: Oh, yes!!
reviews.comments: Works well with Pop lip and cheek oil!!

reviews.headline: Great liner
reviews.comments: The liner goes on smoothly, is just the right color for the lipsticks I use, and is very easy to use.

reviews.headline: I buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: If you want a self-sharpening lip liner, this is one of the few out there. The colors are rich and it goes on smoothly. Sometimes, I use it as a lipstick with a little gloss over. The downside? The size has shrinked a bit since the pandemic.

reviews.headline: Absolutely love this lip Liner
reviews.comments: This is a very moist lip liner, I use this as lipstick rather than lip liner. I don't get the creases from this color choice. Very natural looking . Love it.

media.headline: I'm a fan
media.caption: Figgy #50 with a tad of cherry chapstick

faceoff_positive.comments: I love these. One of my best features are my full lips that are naturally berry red; blue-based or berry lip colors work really well on me. These liners provide shades in the same color family but some are light and others provide depth, giving me variety for work or play. The also serve as an anchor for lip colors. Sky Violet is currently my favorite for daytime. They make whatever I'm wearing, chubby stick, lipstick, almost lipstick, gloss, last a long time; they are a great foundation for layering color in a way to appear polished and pulled together. I wear Crushed Berry with Fireberry lipgloss or A Different Grape (or both) to make a statement. Sky Violet with Shy Honey almost lipstick is my current go-to for work and matches Iced Lotus or Cupid or Shy Blush in creamwear. I can also use it with Lilac Superbalm or Luscious Lilac lip plump. These are like wearing nude colors with shine, but without the brown or orange base. Shy Violet or Pink Truffle works great with my chubby sticks in Bountiful Blush or Voluptuous Violet, or chubby intense in Grandest Grape. While I don't have much of a problem with feathering, the corners of my lips tend to bleed or are the first place the glosses or lipsticks wear away, so these lipliners keep the color even and consistent. I like all the options these give me; I'm not limited to one shade for all my lip color needs. Best of all, my lips never look as though the lipstick has worn away and I'm left with dark lines around the borders of my mouth.
faceoff_positive.headline: Helps me make the most of one of my best features

faceoff_negative.comments: I love Clinique products and have been a long time user. I went to purchase my all time favorite lip liner, Tender Taupe, only to be told that it was discontinued. I was very disappointed. I wasn't even able to purchase it from Clinique.com. In any event, I decided to try the new intense lip liners. I bought Intense Sassafras and Intense Cafe. In general, I don't really like the product. It does not glide onto the lips and it has a funny smell. As for color, the Intense Sassafras is fine, looks very much like Honeystick, but the Intense Cafe is too warm a color, especially under cooler lipsticks, and makes all my nude colors look orangey. I will try Intense Cola, but I do think that will be too dark.
faceoff_negative.headline: Wish I was happier
